DOC.brief_title: An Investigation Test Prototype Full-face Mask Home Setting
DOC.detailed_description: This investigation design evaluate performance ( leak comfort ) well participant 's overall acceptance Jupiter mask amongst OSA participant . A total number 15 OSA participant currently use full face mask recruit trial . The participant recruit Fisher Paykel Healthcare Database subject OSA ( Ethics reference NTY/08/06/064 ) , Auckland District Health Board ( ADHB ) , WellSleep Centre ( Bowen Hospital , Wellington , NZ ) . Participants trial 21 day ± 6 day , use prototype home 14 day ± 3 day . PAP baseline data participant 's prescribed treatment pressure usual mask collect 7 day ± 3 day prior mask fit Jupiter trial mask . Fisher Paykel Healthcare act investigator sponsor investigation . This study conduct accordance ICH/GCP Guidelines . No deviation protocol implement without prior review approval sponsor except may necessary eliminate immediate hazard research participant . In case , deviation report sponsor ( Bhavi Ogra ) soon possible .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 18+ year age Diagnosed OSA practice physician Prescribed PAP therapy ( BiLevel Continuous Positive Airway Pressure ( CPAP ) Automatic Positive Airway Pressure ( APAP ) ) . Patient naïve CPAP therapy experience ( 6 month ) Existing full face mask user Patients able put remove current mask without gross difficulty relate exist condition ( e.g . arthritis hand ) . Exclusion Criteria Inability give inform consent Anatomical physiological condition make PAP therapy inappropriate ( e.g unconsolidated facial fracture ) Commercial Drivers investigate New Zealand Transport Agency ( NZTA ) Current diagnosis CO2 retention Pregnant think may pregnant
